Document.name: Toilets with Bidet Singapore @toiletswithbidetsg
Document.description:
a map of bidets found all over singapore. in hopes that we can find a toilet with an ease of mind ðŸ˜Œ

ig - @toiletswithbidetsg
reddit - r/toiletswithbidetsg

submit your finds/feedback via dm on ig!

Placemark.name: Changi General Hospital - Medical Centre Building @ NDCS Oral & Maxillofacial Surgery ClinicÂ
Placemark.description:
Go to CGH's Medical Centre Building. Accessible to public but you'll need to fill up a declaration form prior to entering.

Proceed up to level 2 and enter their NDCS Oral & Maxillofacial Surgery Clinic.

Walk past the counters and you'll see a handicap toilet on your right.Â
